title: Handbook of Chemistry
additional-notes: Early copyright renewals for this reference were filed under Books, and not under Periodicals.

Lange previously co-edited a reference called Handbook of Chemistry and Physics.  Some editions of that work preceding the first edition of this book also have active copyright renewals.  We have not checked to see whether any copyrighted material from those editions are included in early editions of this work.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Nat Bender for copyright research on this title.
